definition: not to pay attention to/to leave sth as it is/to ignore
(negative prefix)/not/no

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

keep silent/not say a word

embarrassing/dull/unsatisfactory
to hear but not react (idiom); to turn a deaf ear/to ignore deliberately
